title: Does Google camera v8.0 have shift focus issue on Pixel 5?
content:
Due to my Google Pixel 5 taken lower quality photo than my old Pixel 3 XL, so I made several test to figure out what couse this, then find my camera has shift focus issue, it always focus behind on the subject I pointed.

I tried these methods but not working:
• uninstall camera app (back to v7.6)
• factory reset
• clean cache for Google camera app

I wonder if you could confirm if this issue could be fixed by future updates, or I need to RMA? Thank you.

The first attached sample shows the situation, I pointed on the right orange juice pack, but the sharpest is on coffee cup. 


Corp pic below : Pixel 5 (pointed on right orange juice pack but focusing left coffee cup)


P3 XL (focus on right juice pack)


Best regards,
Karl Lu
